word: Encouraged by this success, Gaussen published his lessons, with the hope of promoting the study of the prophetic books in the churches of the French-speaking people. \93To publish instruction given to the children,\94 says Gaussen, \93is to say to adults, who too often neglect such books under the false pretense that they are obscure, \91How can they be obscure, since your children understand them?\92\94 \93I had a great desire,\94 he adds, \93to render a knowledge of the prophecies popular in our flocks, if possible.\94 \93There is no study, indeed, which it seems to me answers the needs of the time better.\94 \93It is by this that we are to prepare for the tribulation near at hand, and watch and wait for Jesus Christ.\94
